meanings.definition: Adorned with flashy jewelry or decorations.
meanings.sent1: She felt so blinged out in her sparkly dress.
meanings.sent2: The rapper's blinged chains caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked blinged up with its collar made of shiny bells.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was blinged with lights, creating a magical view.
meanings.sent5: The blinged-out car gleamed under the sun, turning heads as it drove by.

meanings.definition: To decorate with flashy jewelry or decorations.
meanings.sent1: She blinged her phone case with rhinestones.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity blinged her outfit with diamond earrings.
meanings.sent3: He blinged his bike with colorful streamers, making it stand out.
meanings.sent4: The Christmas tree was blinged with ornaments of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent5: The bride blinged her veil with delicate crystals, adding a touch of elegance.
